channel.title: Biginteger Intvalue on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Biginteger Intvalue on Simple Solution

item.title: Java convert BigInteger to int
item.description: In this Java core tutorial we learn how to use the java.math.BigInteger.intValueExact() and java.math.BigInteger.intValue() method to convert a BigInteger object into an integer value. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to convert BigInteger object to int value To convert a BigInteger value into int value we can use the method java.math.BigInteger.intValueExact(). This method also checks the value of BigInteger if it is out of range of integer then an ArithmeticException is thrown.
